gw.cc.question.entity

Interface Answer


  • public interface Answer
    Answer Text, Logical and Numeric Answers supplied in a specific Question Set. Question Sets are groupings of questions utilized in the risk qualification process or to develop supplemental underwriting information. Specific to ClaimCenter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Integer getScore()
      Gets the score for this Answer; currently only applies for the QuestionChoice question type.
      void setBooleanAnswer(java.lang.Boolean value) 
      void setChoiceAnswer(QuestionChoice value) 
      void setDateAnswer(java.util.Date value) 
      void setIntegerAnswer(java.lang.Integer value) 
      void setTextAnswer(java.lang.String value) 

    • Method Detail

      • getScore

        java.lang.Integer getScore()
        Gets the score for this Answer; currently only applies for the QuestionChoice question type.
        Returns:
        the Score (may be a positive integer or null for "not answered")
